name: MarketSim
description: A stock market simulator reminiscent of a personal trading platform, written using Typescript, React, Express, MongoDB, and Redis. Capstone project for Concordia University Diploma in Full Stack Web Development.

name: MarketSim V2
description: Fork of MarketSim, rewritten with PostgreSQL, containerized with Docker

name: Wearables
description: An full stack e-commerce website written in JavaScript, React, Express, and MongoDB. Completed in a group with 4 other contributors.

name: Asteroid Blaster
description: A cross between tetris and asteroids, written in object oriented JavaScript
